text: "I'm ready for marriage," Luyendyk says in the preview clip. He also stands on top of a moving bicycle in the promo, which doesn't seem very safe, especially considering the fact that he's not wearing a helmet. (Neither is the woman who's trailing behind him on a bicycle of her own.) But, hey, he's a silver fox who's got tricks!
